channel.title: MySQL -- speed question
channel.description:
okay, I have a CZAR scape source....(Reapagescape) :|
I finally got MySQL for character files to start instead of the .txt files.... Should I also have all the files like items.cfg and npc.cfg and shops.cfg from mysql?
The files are not small like the character files.
this is what i have so far for the items in mysql [code] CREATE TABLE `scar`.`itemscfg` ( `id` INT( 10 ) NOT NULL , `item` VARCHAR( 30 ) NOT NULL , `desc` VARCHAR( 50 ) NOT NULL , `price1` DEC( 30 ) NOT NULL , `price2` DEC( 30 ) NOT NULL , `price3` DEC( 30 ) NOT NULL , `sta` INT( 1 ) NOT NULL , `sla` INT( 1 ) NOT NULL , `cru` INT( 1 ) NOT NULL , `mag` INT( 1 ) NOT NULL , `rag` INT( 1 ) NOT NULL , `dst` INT( 1 ) NOT NULL , `dsl` INT( 1 ) NOT NULL , `d_c` INT( 1 ) NOT NULL , `d_m` INT( 1 ) NOT NULL , `d_r` INT( 1 ) NOT NULL , `str` INT( 1 ) NOT NULL , `pray` INT( 1 ) NOT NULL , UNIQUE ( `id` ) ) ENGINE = InnoDB [/code]
I'm just curious what would load faster, 800kb straight from hard drive or mysql.... if i do mysql i can make a .php for friend's to edit stuff..... i could still do it with .cfg but thats why im curious what would load faster.....

item.title: MySQL -- speed question
item.dc:creator: @Sonis Sonis
item.description:
@Sonis wrote:

okay, I have a CZAR scape source…(Reapagescape)

I finally got MySQL for character files to start instead of the .txt files…
Should I also have all the files like items.cfg and npc.cfg and shops.cfg from mysql?

The files are not small like the character files.

this is what i have so far for the items in mysql

CREATE TABLE `scar`.`itemscfg` ( `id` INT( 10 ) NOT NULL , `item` VARCHAR( 30 ) NOT NULL , `desc` VARCHAR( 50 ) NOT NULL , `price1` DEC( 30 ) NOT NULL , `price2` DEC( 30 ) NOT NULL , `price3` DEC( 30 ) NOT NULL , `sta` INT( 1 ) NOT NULL , `sla` INT( 1 ) NOT NULL , `cru` INT( 1 ) NOT NULL , `mag` INT( 1 ) NOT NULL , `rag` INT( 1 ) NOT NULL , `dst` INT( 1 ) NOT NULL , `dsl` INT( 1 ) NOT NULL , `d_c` INT( 1 ) NOT NULL , `d_m` INT( 1 ) NOT NULL , `d_r` INT( 1 ) NOT NULL , `str` INT( 1 ) NOT NULL , `pray` INT( 1 ) NOT NULL , UNIQUE ( `id` ) ) ENGINE = InnoDB

I’m just curious what would load faster, 800kb straight from hard drive or mysql…
if i do mysql i can make a .php for friend’s to edit stuff…
i could still do it with .cfg but thats why im curious what would load faster…
